name: Flupp Bird
description:
This game is developed by a group of Vietnam created (Original Game: Flappy Bird). Hope you enjoy!
Difficult game for you have no patience, if not all non-phone into the wall.
You need to put this Flupp birds through high embankment.
- Tap the screen to bring up the flight of birds
- Used to compete with friends and relax.
I wish you a happy game .... :)
